title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: Cork-born attacking midfielder David Hurley joined Galway United in 2020 and has been a key figure ever since. Hurley signed from Cobh Ramblers in November 2020. He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title.

title: Galway United's David Hurley to serve two-match ban after red card against St Pat's - The Home of Irish Football - extratime.com
snippet: And the governing body has revealed Hurley’s suspension will stand. The midfielder will serve a two-match ban as a result, and will miss the upcoming games against Sligo Rovers and Cork City.

title: David Hurley (footballer) - Wikipedia
snippet: On 22 September 2023, Hurley scored in a 4–0 win over Kerry at Mounthawk Park to secure promotion back to the Premier Division by winning the 2023 League of Ireland First Division title. He was named Galway United Player of the Year for 2023 at the club's end of season awards.
